cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to '0xZZZ' (invalid hex format) will cause parsing failure during configuration loading and gNB initialization error.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 200 (exceeds maximum 106 for band 78) will cause invalid bandwidth configuration error and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 200（超過頻帶 78 的最大值 106）會導致無效頻寬配置錯誤，並造成小區設定失敗。
